---
title: "Using Quizlet to Learn Key Terms"
---

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE,
                      error = TRUE,
                      comment = "")
```

1. Click on the link to below to access Quizlet for each lecture in our course
    - https://quizlet.com/join/47vPE4ndA?i=26ulz1&x=1rqt
1. Click on the lecture for which you want to learn key terms
1. Select the Study Method you want to use
    - "Flashcards", "Test", and "Match" are best for our course (see guidance [here](howToStudy.html#testYourself) on how to use Quizlet to study for this class)
